comments.body: What's the ordering of these error codes? They don't seem to line up with the numerical order of the [gRPC error codes](https://grpc.github.io/grpc/core/md_doc_statuscodes.html). I don't expect to align them as part of this PR.
I contacted Kamil who documented them initially not that long ago. There is no particular order. I can change this if you'd like.
It's fine to change this as part of a different PR -- I'm OK with merging this one as-is.
